/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with tall apartment buildings, their red brick facades adding a touch of color to the urban landscape. Cars and buses fill the street, indicating a busy time of day. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many cities. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the red brick buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
